END, [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], CAST(COALESCE([x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag], 0) AS bit) AS [HomeFlag], [x.ProductCategory].[Id], [x.ProductCategory].[CreatedDate], [x.ProductCategory].[UpdatedDate], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeyWord], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoKeyWord] AS [SeoKeyWord0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[CreatedDate] AS [CreatedDate0], [x].[UpdatedDate] AS [UpdatedDate0]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
WHERE ([x].[Status] = 1) AND ([x].[CategoryId] = @__categoryId_Value_0)
ORDER BY [CreatedDate0] DESC
OFFSET @__p_1 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_2 ROWS ONLY" (0723d8ff)
